sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useAppSelector } from '../app/hooks' import image1 from '../imgs/28.svg' import image2 from '../imgs/29.svg' const Blog = () => { const { selectedBlog: {_id, body, description, index, title} } = useAppSelector((state) => state.selected) const navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(() => { if(!_id) { navigate('/') } }, [navigate, _id]) const image = index % 2 === 0? image1: image2 return (

{description}

{title}

{body}

) } export default Blog
